formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: PDF: \( f(x) = \frac{1}{\sigma \sqrt{2\pi}} \exp\left( - \frac{(x-\mu)^2}{2 \sigma^2} \right) \) CDF: \( F(x) = \frac{1}{2} \left[ 1 + \operatorname{erf} \left( \frac{x-\mu}{\sigma \sqrt{2}} \right) \right] \) Standardize: \( z = \frac{x-\mu}{\sigma} \)
